title: Tabs Data Schema
description: JSON schema for _data/tabs.yml following standardized site data schema pattern

id.description: URL-safe unique identifier for the tab. Used for ARIA IDs, CSS classes, and JavaScript selection.

name.description: Display title shown in the tab navigation bar. Used as tab button text and ARIA label.

description.description: Content displayed when the tab is active. Supports markdown formatting (processed by Jekyll) and raw HTML when needed.

url.description: Optional external URL. Available for future use or display.

logo.description: Optional path to logo image. Available for future use or display.

tags.description: Optional array of tag strings. Available for future use or display.

status.description: Optional status indicator. Available for future use or display.

featured.description: Optional featured flag. Available for future use or display.

category.description: Optional category classification. Available for future use or display.

repo.description: Optional repository URL. Available for future use or display.

contact.description: Optional contact information. Available for future use or display.

year.description: Optional year field. Available for future use or display.

examples.name: Overview
examples.description: This is the overview tab content.
